column5: I hope all is well with everyone and you are now dry from Walleye opener! Not sure how many of you are on Twitter but if you are you can follow me there at http://twitter.com/FactsofFishing I will be giving some neat updates while on the water throughout the year.
So you're a twit now eh Dave  Joey
well Dave I guess I will have to look up this twitter stuff and yep I think Joey hit it on the head
Not sure how much I'll use this thing but you got 1 more follower Dave!

Hey Joey I have always been a Twit! You know that. I think it will be a pretty cool deal as I will be trying to update it a bunch when I am on the water shooting shows this year. I will be trying to let all the followers know what goes on in that messed up area between my ears MY BRAIN!
dave take me fishing u rule!!!!!!
Well.. ill follow ya.. i dont know where your heading.. but ill follow...
... isn't "twitter" for school girls and g-a-y guys to follows their hunks with???... never been there, and don't wanna go!!!  .. just what I've seen from the MSN homepage... kinda skeery really!!!

Hi Dave Thanks for coming up to Orillia for the OPP/Subway day last week at Tudhope Park (and also as part of the perch festival); it was great to spend a few minutes with ya'.....so many kids had a blast that day.. thanks for the pics and bobblehead! Rich
Hey GCD, I did not know that it was where gay guy's hang out but I will take YOUR word for it seeing as you seem to know! lol

oh SNAP !! hahahah Twitter eh ? Well I figure if its good enough for Mr. Mercer, I had better get on.  Officially just started my twitter account  So I'm guessing its just a matter of time till Facebook is dead !
